name: Playground (Zuko Dave, Khuo, Gabriel Espinal, JhoseC)
name_original: Playground (Zuko Dave, Khuo, Gabriel Espinal, JhoseC)
description:
Welcome to the Playground!! Come and play with us in this cute and funny  parry-based game! Nothing bad will happen, you just need to reflect proyectiles and dont being hit. 

But be careful, the game can be more complicated as you progress ;)

Good Luck and have fun!!

Controls

A & D: Move 

Space Bar: Jump (x2 = Double Jump)

Right Click: Parry

Left Click: Dash

.

.

Playground is the second game developed by Night Desk! And is also our second time participating in this jam (Yaaaaaaai :D)

The developers of Night Desk are:

David (Zuko):

 Lead designer, Lead Artist, Pixel Artist, Animator

Jose Carlos (Jock):

3D Modeling, Designer, VFX, Programmer, Musician

Iago (Khuo):

Main Programer, Designer

Gabriel Espinal:

Main Musician, SFX

A special mention to Ricardo Franco for assist us with some programming help, and Kevin Ortega for giving the initial idea for a parry-based game. We are really thankfull!!

Disclaimer:

In the current version there is a little error where the "Victory Screen" doesnt appear when you beat the game. Follow us on twitter if you want to play the patched version of the game (before the jam of course)

https://twitter.com/night_desk
